title: Pfizer Licenses Promising Covid-19 Pill to U.N.-Backed Nonprofit
sub_head: Manufacturing agreement is second by Medicines Patent Pool aiming to boost supplies of pill to prevent infections from turning severe
body:
Pfizer Inc. is licensing its experimental Covid-19 antiviral to a global health organization in an effort to make the pill more readily available to people in low- and middle-income countries.
Under the licensing agreement, the United Nations-backed Medicines Patent Pool will work with other drugmakers to manufacture the pill for use in 95 countries, including in sub-Saharan Africa, Pfizer and the nonprofit said Tuesday.
